briefdescription.para: id of the application this interaction is for
the type of interaction
Optional: the command data payload.
Optional: the guild it was sent from.
Optional: the channel it was sent from.
Originating message id for context menu actions.
Permissions of the bot in the channel/guild where this command was issued.
Originating message for context menu actions.
Optional: guild member data for the invoking user, including permissions.
User object for the invoking user.
a continuation token for responding to the interaction
read-only property, always 1
Resolved user/role etc.
User's locale (language)
Guild's locale (language) - for guild interactions only.
Cache policy from cluster.
Unique ID of object set by Discord. This value contains a timestamp, worker ID, internal server ID, and an incrementing value. Only the timestamp is relevant to us as useful metadata.

parameterdescription.para: type of object to retrieve
container defintion for resolved container

briefdescription.para: Get the command name for a command interaction.

briefdescription.para: Fill object properties from JSON.

parameterdescription.para: JSON to fill from

briefdescription.para: Build a json string for this object.

parameterdescription.para: True if to include the ID in the JSON

briefdescription.para: Get the creation time of this object according to Discord.

simplesect.para: double creation time inferred from the snowflake ID. The minimum possible value is the first second of 2015.

briefdescription.para: Comparison operator for comparing two managed objects by id.

parameterdescription.para: Other object to compare against

simplesect.para: true objects are the same id
false objects are not the same id

briefdescription.para: Comparison operator for comparing two managed objects by id.

parameterdescription.para: Other object to compare against

simplesect.para: true objects are not the same id
false objects are the same id

briefdescription.para: An interaction represents a user running a command and arrives via the dpp::cluster::on_interaction_create event. This is further split into the events on_form_submit, on_slashcommand, on_user_context_menu, on_button_click, on_select_menu, etc.
